p: Taking a part of GF-1 data as the experimental data ( Fig. 2), three fusion algorithms as commonly used in the image fusion experiments were applied. Mean and standard deviation values of fusion image using multiplicative algorithm are far from raw image ( Fig. 3a,b). Entropy and correlation coefficient values of fusion image using PCA algorithm are greater than Brovey Transform ( Fig. 3c,d). It shows that Principal Component Analysis (PCA) image fusion algorithm is the best choice for GF-1 data fusion ( Table 1). Then PCA image fusion algorithm was finally used on entire GF-1 data.
